author: COMSOL
description:
This example shows how to set up multiple sandwiched thin layers with different thermal conductivities in two different ways.
First, the composite is modeled as a 3D object. 
In the second approach the Thin Layer boundary condition is used to avoid resolving the thin domains.
label: composite_thermal_barrier.mph
name: root
